predictions.text: - You must be at least 18 years old to register or subscribe for Travelzoo's Services because Travelzoo is available only to individuals who can form legally binding contracts under applicable law

predictions.text: To opt-out of receiving push notifications, you can disable push notifications on your mobile device system settings

predictions.text: Travelzoo does not rent or sell personal information about you to third parties, however, we reserve the right to share the personal information we collect about you through our Services with third parties when we have your permission or under the following circumstances:
predictions.description: This service does not sell your personal data

predictions.text: We may also provide data to our third party analytics partners, such as Google Analytics, for the purposes of tracking usage information.

predictions.description: You can opt out of promotional communications

predictions.text: tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout

predictions.text: If an individual whose personal information you have provided us wishes to request the removal of their personal information they can contact us via the feedback form at the end of this policy;
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: We may transfer, share, or disclose your personal information to third parties as part of any corporate reorganization process such as a merger, acquisition, and/or a sale of all, substantially all, or part of our assets, and/or a licensing agreement with third parties

predictions.text: We may combine this automatically collected log information with other information we collect about you in order to improve the services we offer you, improve our marketing efforts, perform analytics, or improve site functionality
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: Travelzoo and our partners, affiliates, and service providers, such as our marketing partners, use cookies, web beacons, etags, and scripts to personalize our Services to your preferences and to provide an automatic log-in process.
predictions.description: Tracking pixels and/or device fingerprinting

predictions.text: A web beacon is activated as part of a web page or email and allows us to count visitors to our websites and to recognize users by accessing Travelzoo cookies which help us personalize your experience when you use our Services.
predictions.description: Tracking pixels and/or device fingerprinting

predictions.text: We may partner with third party ad networks to either display advertising on our website or to manage our advertising on other sites
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: In addition, we may partner with an ad network, which may use cookies and web beacons to collect information on your activities on this and other websites, to provide you targeted advertisements based on your interests
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: If you wish to not have this information used for the purpose of serving you targeted ads, you may opt-out by clicking here or here

predictions.text: If you are in the European Union and would like to opt-out, please click here

predictions.text: Please note this does not opt you out of being served advertising

predictions.text: On Fly.com, third parties with whom we partner to provide certain features on our site or to display advertising based upon your web browsing activity use LSOs such as HTML storage and Flash cookies to collect and store information.

predictions.text: You must use the feedback form below to request deletion of your information
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: If you request termination of your Travelzoo account, it is our practice to deactivate your account and block further email deliveries to you in approximately ten business days
predictions.description: You have the right to leave this service at any time

predictions.text: We will retain your information for as long as needed to provide you Services

predictions.text: Please note that the information Travelzoo collects about you may be stored on servers outside your home country - currently on servers in the United States
predictions.description: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

predictions.text: If you are visiting our websites from a country other than the United States or your home country, please note that the United States or other countries where we may be hosting servers may not have the same data protection laws as your country or jurisdiction
predictions.description: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

predictions.text: Travelzoo may update this Policy from time to time
